scripts.build-package-exp: lerna run build --parallel --ignore architecture-* && lerna run --scope architecture-dee build:stage
scripts.build-package-demonstration: lerna run build --parallel --ignore architecture-* && lerna run --scope architecture-dee build:demonstration
scripts.build: npm run build-package && npm run move
scripts.exp: npm run build-package-exp && npm run move
scripts.demo: npm run build-package-demonstration && npm run move
